thread.title_full: Shruti Haasan on rumours of her relationship with Michael Corsale: It doesn’t irritate me, I just choose to ignore such talks

author: Karan Shah
title: Shruti Haasan on rumours of her relationship with Michael Corsale: It doesn’t irritate me, I just choose to ignore such talks
text:
Shruti Haasan brought in her birthday with family and friends in a cosy affair 
In the last few week, lot has been spoken about Shruti Haasan ‘s personal life. Rumours of her relationship started doing the round after she was spotted with a mysterious guy on various occasions. We did a little research and found out that the popular South star is most certainly dating London-based theatre artiste Michael Corsale from the past three months. The duo have been spotted at the airport arriving from and leaving for vacations on numerous occasions in the past few weeks. In fact, from Shruti and Michael’s Instagram posts, we also came to know that the rumoured couple spent Valentine’s Day together on a romantic getaway. But what does Shruti Haasan have to say about her relationship? 
While speaking about the speculations around her love life, Shruti revealed to Bombay Times, “I’m not concerned about such speculations, nor do I want to comment on them. And trust me, it doesn’t irritate me, I just choose to ignore such talks because I don’t like to talk about my personal life.” Earlier the actress has been linked with Suresh Raina (Indian cricketer) and Ranbir Kapoor (actor) too. However, she has always kept quite about such speculations about her love life. ALSO READ – Shruti Haasan is back from her romantic getaway with boyfriend Michael Corsale- view pics 
Daughter of legendary actor Kamal Haasan , Shruti is well known for her stunning performances in both the Telugu and Hindi cinema. She has been impressing one and all with her performances in films like Gabbar Singh , Race Gurram , Vedalam , Gabbar is Back and Srimanthudu . Currently, the actress is shooting for Katamarayudu , Sabaash Naidu and Sangamithra simultaneously down south. She also has one Bollywood release – Behen Hogi Teri opposite Raj Kummar Rao this year. ALSO READ – REVEALED: All you need to know about Shruti Haasan’s boyfriend Michael Corsale 
Anyway, stay tuned to BollywoodLife as we get you all latest updates and gossip about Shruti Haasan ‘s relationship with Michael Corsale right here… Published: February 26, 2017 12:37 pm Topics:
